version_description:
- New map: Super Slide
- New skins (boar, dinosaur, fox, hatched egg)
- Reconnect to party room after a match
- Facebook login for cloud saving
- Tile Fall map visual update
- UI update for tablets
- Bug fixes & Other improvements

- New elimination map: Laser Tracer
- New skins
- Improved localizations
- Added Adaptive icon
- Bug fixes & small improvements
- Preparations for upcoming features

- New map: Lost Temple
- New Skins
- New variants to all skins
- Added Russian & Polish translations
- Bug fixes & small improvements

- New map: Rocket Rumble
- New skins
- Bug fixes and small improvements

- new Map: Jungle Roll
- new skins
- Improved UI
- Changed variants to be separate skins -> everyone who owns variants will see them automatically convert
- Skins have rarities
- Removed ad limit for gems
